body:
### About ###

MacSpell is a spell checker designed on Cocoa's spell-checking facilities.

### Usage ###

Check spelling of README file.

    ./macspell.py --list < README

Learn new words.

    ./macspell.py --learn
    Rudá
    Sumé
    ^D

Forget learned words:

    ./macspell.py --unlearn
    Rudá
    Sumé
    ^D

Emacs and MacSpell:

    ;; MacSpell
    (setq ispell-program-name "/path/to/macspell.py")
    (setq ispell-extra-args '("--encoding=latin1" "--auto-lang=no"))
    ;(setq ispell-dictionary "english")
tagline: MacSpell is a spell checker designed on Cocoa's spell-checking facilities
name: Macspell
